citations.narrative:
There are pitted and eroded areas on the surface of the flooring in the animal quarantine room . An enclosure with 2 mini
pigs is in this room at time of the inspection. Debris is accumulating in the eroded area of the floor making sanitation
difficult. The flooring needs to be repaired or replaced and maintained in good repair to facilitate husbandry practices.
CORRECT BY : 6/24/2021
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with husbandry staff and managers.
End Section

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
